text:
@WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence What about holding trump's administration accountable to what they did & didn't do once here?

112,104 Americans DEAD of Covid19 

36.5 mil Americans are unemployed

Americans are standing in food lines

STILL no testing strategy

Civil unrest blankets our 

Work on THOSE issues! https://t.co/KWYzHFwuDC
